actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide that veterans be provided employment opportunities after discharge at certain minimum salary rates.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to take action (including the making of monetary grants) to insure employment in a Federal, State, local, or private nonprofit agency or institution to veterans with other than dishonorable discharges, who do not avail themselves of veterans' educational benefits, during the 24 month period following their discharge. Establishes a formula for determining the salary rates of positions in which such veterans can be employed.

titles.title: A bill to provide that veterans be provided employment opportunities after discharge at certain minimum salary rates.
